data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Sivasagar, Assam, India know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sivasagar, Assam, India

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Sivasagar to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Sivasagar, Assam, India.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 1,638 believers in Sivasagar against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Deori people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 145,455, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Sivasagar that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.section_summary:
the county of Sivasagar, Assam, India has a population of 148,900.

We estimate Sivasagar has 1,638 people who might know Jesus, 1,807 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 145,455 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Sivasagar, Assam, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
